mapper.insert: insert into notice(notice_title, notice_content, notice_filepath) values (#{notice_title}, #{notice_content}, #{notice_filepath})
mapper.update: update notice set notice_title=#{notice_title}, notice_content=#{notice_content}, notice_filepath=#{notice_filepath} where notice_no=#{notice_no}
mapper.insert: insert into board_event(board_event_title, board_event_content, banner_no, board_event_filepath) values (#{board_event_title}, #{board_event_content}, #{banner_no}, #{board_event_filepath})
mapper.update: update board_event set board_event_title=#{board_event_title}, board_event_content=#{board_event_content}, board_event_filepath=#{board_event_filepath} where board_event_no=#{board_event_no}
